Title: The people's post and telecommunications office
Publisher: East China Post and Telecommunications Management Office of the Ministry of Post and Telecommunications (邮电部华东邮电管理局)
Notes: This early 1950s (ca. 1953) poster shows the various services that the post and telecommunications office offers: postal telegraph (邮转电报); delivery of letters and telegrams (书信电报); information (微询); long-distance calls (长途电话); stationery (信函); purchasing goods on behalf of others (代购货物); publishing newspapers and periodicals (发行报刊); money exchange and banking (汇兑).
